definitions.definition: Of a type or kind that suffices , that satisfies requirements or needs.
examples: This is a necessary condition but not a sufficient one.

definitions.definition: Possessing adequate talents or accomplishments ; of competent power or ability; qualified ; fit .
Having enough money to meet obligations and live comfortably.

main_definition: Of a type or kind that suffices , that satisfies requirements or needs.
secondary_definitions: Possessing adequate talents or accomplishments ; of competent power or ability; qualified ; fit .
( archaic ) Capable of meeting obligations ; responsible .
( obsolete ) Having enough money to meet obligations and live comfortably.
